name: Slenderman - Wrong Place
description:
This game has 2 endings, Good Ending and Bad Ending.

Game has been changed to fix all issues in game. You work with some of the finest minds on the planet dealing with the strange and unusual, when suddenly power goes out and you find yourself locked in a room. With no power or any hope of help, its up to you to escape. But can you do it alone? Press 'Enter' to interact with items, collect notes to help you in the game.
